content.eamr: ( ing-2 "2 cups frozen whipped topping, thawed" )

content.text: 0) Blend together the cream cheese, marshmallow cream and thawed topping.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Blend"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the cream cheese"@18:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "marshmallow cream"@36:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "thawed topping"@58:72 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add enough pineapple juice to make it dipping consistency.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "enough pineapple juice"@7:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-1-0 "to make it dipping consistency"@30:60 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)
